verbose_text: Yun et al [XREF_BIBR] showed that gefitinib directly binds more tightly to the L858R mutant than to the wild type EGFR in vitro, while Fabian et al [XREF_BIBR] indicated that EGFR with gefitinib sensitive mutations does not differ from wild type EGFR in terms of gefitinib binding affinity.
evidence: gefitinib directly binds more tightly to the L858R mutant than to the wild type EGFR
